channel.title: suck on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in suck on Barefoot Rob

item.title: voom voom vacuum
item.description: 21:46 Sunday 25 October 2015 JST Lin and I have been looking at vacuum cleaners recently, wavering between Electrolux and Dyson, and now wondering if we really need a new one at all. She was thinking 20,000 yen at first, and now we’re in the 60,000 yen range. Hmm. If it lasts 5 years, that’s 1000 yen per month.
